# Save time. Grow revenue.
The #1 platform for studios, gyms, spas, and dance schools. Put your backend admin on autopilot and get back to doing what you love most.
[Start free trial](https://momence.com/<https:/momence.com/sign-up>) [Book a Demo](https://momence.com/<https:/momence.com/book-a-demo>)

## Never miss a step in your customer journeys 
Momence was built to help you create bespoke experiences for every single one of your customers. We help automate your manual tasks, from taking bookings, to closing new leads, to converting intros into members, to nurturing members who are at risk of cancelling. Do more of what you love with Momence.

### Scheduling
All class & appointment scheduling in one place. Create memberships & packs. Embed schedules on your website and utilize high-converting landing pages.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_16.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_12.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_4.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05_3.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/advertising_outline_24.svg)
### Inbox
One source of truth for all of your customer communication. Two-way SMS, email, and in-app messaging. Hyper-segment customer lists for efficient outreach and newsletters.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_11.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_15.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05_2.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_3.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/features_icons.svg)
### Automations
Create automated sequences for customer communication, client interactions, and staff task management. Convert more leads and customers into members.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_17.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_5.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_13.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_4.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Shopping-Tag.svg)
### Point of sale
Simplify your in-person sales with our comprehensive point of sale. Take payments with our contactless card reader and track retail product inventory.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05_4.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_14.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_6.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_5.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-18533.svg)
### Staff management
Efficiently oversee and control staff access with customizable permission levels, while easily generating and analyzing payroll reports with our user-friendly management tools.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_18.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_7.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_6.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_15.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-253.svg)
### Reporting
Robust reporting and visualized insights into every part of your business. Stay on top of your KPIs and make informed business decisions.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_19.webp)

![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Video.svg)
### On-demand content
Build and manage your own comprehensive videos and courses library.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02.png)

Momence is versatile yet unique to your type of business: one software that consolidates multiple softwares into an easy-to-use platform.

#  Features 
Discover how Momence can be tailored to meet the unique needs of your business and help you save time, consolidate multiple softwares into one platform, and work for you as you grow your business. 
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/6436f01f9548c762c9529a3d_02.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/17.svg)
### Class & Appointment Scheduling
An easy-to-use comprehensive booking platform that helps you take online and in-person bookings with ease. Manage all your class and appointment bookings in one platform. Create & sell memberships and packs, restrict bookings by customer level and type, seamlessly manage your staff and venues, and more.
Email In-App SMS
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_1.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_1.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/16.svg)
### Inbox
Streamline your communication by sending two-way SMS, in-app messages, beautiful emails, Instagram and Facebook DMs from one place.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/sequence.svg)
### Sequences
Our sequences functionality allows you to create and automate customer journeys by creating automations that send client communication, create staff tasks, or execute logic in your account. Our sequences tool helps businesses increase their conversion rates and helps you ensure that no client falls through the cracks.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_1.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/6438584e1aabe6ce085db441_03.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_4.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_5.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/11.svg)
### Staff management, Staff roles and Instructor substitutions
If you have multiple staff members, you can create multiple staff roles that grant your staff varying levels of access to your account. Automate instructor substitutions for your classes and track staff clock-ins within Momence.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_1.svg)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/10.svg)
### Newsletters & Outreach
Hyper-segment your customers and create multiple customer lists for targeted outreach with promos and newsletters across all of your communication channels. Track open rates, clickthrough rates, and more.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_1.png)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_5.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_6.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/18.svg)
### Smart notifications
Stay on top of all activity that takes place in your business with our smart notifications, keeping you and your staff ready to support every one of your customers.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-341.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Card.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-340.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/gift.svg)
### Gift cards & Discount codes
Create unlimited gift cards (physical and digital) and discount codes. Choose what items your gift cards and discount codes apply to. Let your customers create and schedule custom digital gift cards.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/checkin.svg)
### Spot scheduling
You can build custom rooms so your customers can select their spot when booking a class. Customize the look and feel of your spot selection to create a unified and branded customer booking experience.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03.png)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_2.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_2.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/15.svg)
### Memberships
Offer any format of memberships you'd like with our robust Memberships offering: unlimited memberships, usage-limited, free trials, and more. Easily upgrade/downgrade and transfer customers between your memberships.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_3.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_2.svg)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/14.svg)
### Reporting
Providing robust and easy to understand reporting is one of Momence's most important functions. Momence allows you to easily visualize your KPIs and dig deeper into your metrics using our comprehensive set of reports. Track sales on a cash-basis and earned revenue basis, run payroll reports, see intro offer conversion rates, and much more.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_3.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_4.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/13.svg)
### Support
Our support team is available to assist you 24/7 via phone, live chat, or email, all at no cost to you.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/08.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/07.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/09.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/12.svg)
### Migration
With our onboarding specialists, you can migrate from your current platform with ease
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_25.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01-1.png)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01-1.png)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01-1.png)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/posts.svg)
### Community posts and groups
Create community groups and post content (videos, images, audios, blog posts) directly into your groups. Your group members will be able to like and comment posts, and reply to each other's comments. Foster a community amongst your customers by running challenges and posting updates into their feed.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Group-18525.svg)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Card_1.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/spot.svg)
### Arrivals
Track arrivals with any key, barcode, or fob system (we support both manned and un-manned arrival-tracking). See logs of when people enter and exit your facility, and integrate with one of our door-access control providers to maintain control over which of your customers can unlock doors at your venue.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_7.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_6.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/09.svg)
### Payments and payment plans
Collect payments online and in-person, including cards and direct debit payment methods. Save payment methods on file and easily set up payment plans to charge customers over several periods for your high-ticket items.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02-1.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01-1.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/08.svg)
### Reviews
Collect reviews after classes and appointments with push notifications. Automatically push 5-star customers to leave Google reviews for your business. Embed your reviews plugin on your website to showcase real-time 5-star testimonials.
yourwebsite.com
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_8.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/07.svg)
### Website plugins
Embed your class schedules, appointment booking forms, lead collection forms, intake forms, 5-star reviews, and more directly on your website with our plug-and-play code snippets. We work with every website provider to integrate every aspect of your business performance directly with your existing website. Don't have a website? Use our auto-generated business pages.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/06.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_2.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05_1.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_9.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_2.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_7.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/06.svg)
### Ready-made integrations
Explore our integrations with our complementary software partners.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_10.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/05.svg)
### Kiosk and self check-in
Allow your customers to check themselves into classes on their own using our customizable self check-in kiosk.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_1.svg)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_2.svg)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_3.svg)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04.svg)
### On-demand video library & LMS courses
Build your own on-demand library that you can bundle with your existing memberships, or sell as stand-alone items. Create on-demand LMS courses for teacher trainings and more.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_11.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_8.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03.svg)
### Lead collection and lead management
Collect leads directly from Facebook lead ads, from your website, or in-person at your studio. Track follow-ups, lead stages, and the health of your pipeline.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_12.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_9.webp)
[![Get it on Google Play](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_3.svg)](https://momence.com/<#>) [![Download from App Store](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_4.svg)](https://momence.com/<#>)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_1.svg)
### Mobile app
Using the Momence mobile app to create a mobile-first presence for your business. The Momence app is strictly a booking app, meaning that your customers will only see your business if that is the only business they have visited. Customers cannot search for other businesses on the Momence app. The Momence app is free, though we do offer custom branded app options.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_3.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_10.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_13.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01.svg)
### Retail products & Inventory management
Sell retail products and merchandise, both online and in-person in Momence. Create and print barcodes, automatically generate purchase orders, use your existing product scanner, and manage inventory across multiple locations.
### Simplify your software
Most businesses on Momence choose us for two main reasons: we're a modern, well-designed platform and we consolidate 3-5 softwares into one. Simplify your business operations by getting started on Momence.
[Start free trial](https://momence.com/<https:/momence.com/sign-up>)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_14.webp)

## Momence mobile app and branded apps 
Your customers expect your business to be mobile-first. Momence lets you have a modern and elegant mobile-first presence out of the box. Your customers can book classes and appointments, manage their bookings and user profile, message you, and more from the mobile app. The Momence app lets you send push notifications and community group messages directly from your dashboard. Optionally, we offer custom branded mobile apps.

#  Features 
Discover how Momence can be tailored to meet the unique needs of your business and help you save time, consolidate multiple softwares into one platform, and work for you as you grow your business. 
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/6436f01f9548c762c9529a3d_02.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/17.svg)
### Class & Appointment Scheduling
An easy-to-use comprehensive booking platform that helps you take online and in-person bookings with ease. Manage all your class and appointment bookings in one platform. Create & sell memberships and packs, restrict bookings by customer level and type, seamlessly manage your staff and venues, and more.
Email In-App SMS
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_1.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_1.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/16.svg)
### Inbox
Streamline your communication by sending two-way SMS, in-app messages, beautiful emails, Instagram and Facebook DMs from one place.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/sequence.svg)
### Sequences
Our sequences functionality allows you to create and automate customer journeys by creating automations that send client communication, create staff tasks, or execute logic in your account. Our sequences tool helps businesses increase their conversion rates and helps you ensure that no client falls through the cracks.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/04_1.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/6438584e1aabe6ce085db441_03.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_4.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_5.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/11.svg)
### Staff management, Staff roles and Instructor substitutions
If you have multiple staff members, you can create multiple staff roles that grant your staff varying levels of access to your account. Automate instructor substitutions for your classes and track staff clock-ins within Momence.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_1.svg)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/10.svg)
### Newsletters & Outreach
Hyper-segment your customers and create multiple customer lists for targeted outreach with promos and newsletters across all of your communication channels. Track open rates, clickthrough rates, and more.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/03_1.png)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/02_5.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/01_6.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/18.svg)
### Smart notifications
Stay on top of all activity that takes place in your business with our smart notifications, keeping you and your staff ready to support every one of your customers.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-341.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Card.webp)![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/Frame-340.webp)
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/gift.svg)
### Gift cards & Discount codes
Create unlimited gift cards (physical and digital) and discount codes. Choose what items your gift cards and discount codes apply to. Let your customers create and schedule custom digital gift cards.
![](https://momence.com/landing-version5/images/checkin.svg)
### Spot scheduling
You can build custom rooms so your customers can select their spot when booking a class. Customize the look and feel of your spot selection to create a unified and branded customer booking experience.

Track sales on a cash-basis and earned revenue basis, run payroll reports, see intro offer conversion rates, and much more.

### Momence: Simplifying Scheduling and Payments for Experiences

**Company Overview:**
Momence, founded in 2020, is a tech startup located in San Francisco that operates at the intersection of scheduling and payment solutions. Their goal is to streamline booking processes for businesses like studios, gyms, spas, and dance schools, enabling them to focus on their core activities while Momence manages backend operations. The company emerged from Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch and now has a team of 75 dedicated employees.

**Mission:**
The mission of Momence is straightforward: to simplify scheduling and payments for experiences, making operations seamless for businesses and enhancing customer service.

**Features & Offerings:**
Momence is described as an all-in-one platform catering primarily to service-based industries. Here are some standout offerings:

- **Class & Appointment Scheduling:** A comprehensive system to manage online and in-person bookings, create and sell memberships, and seamlessly integrate schedules into existing websites.
- **Customer Communication:** A unified inbox allowing for two-way SMS, email, and in-app messaging, optimizing outreach through segmented customer lists.
- **Automated Workflows:** Streamlined customer journeys through automated communication, from booking to retention.
- **Point of Sale and Payments:** Capable of handling in-person transactions and various payment methods, improving revenue collection without friction.
- **Staff Management:** Tools to manage staff roles, permissions, and payroll reporting effectively, ensuring efficient team operations.
- **Robust Reporting:** Insightful analytics that allow users to track KPIs and make data-driven decisions.
- **On-Demand Content:** The platform supports building video libraries and LMS courses, integrating them into membership offerings.

**Market Position:**
Being tagged in the areas of 'payments', 'scheduling', and specifically the 'San Francisco Bay Area' highlights their target markets and operational focus. Their position as a modern, versatile alternative to multiple disjointed systems is a key selling point.

**Growth and Support:**
Momence is keen on facilitating business growth—users can customize the platform to fit their needs while benefiting from comprehensive customer support available 24/7. They also encourage potential users to start with a free trial and explore the platform risk-free.

**Team and Leadership:**
Under the guidance of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell from Y Combinator, Momence has positioned itself for rapid growth and innovation in a competitive market.

**Conclusion:**
In a world where time is money, Momence recognizes that businesses need to go beyond just managing schedules and payments. They provide a holistic approach to operations that not only saves time but also drives revenue growth. Whether you're a yoga studio or a wellness spa, Momence seeks to empower you to do what you love most—serving your customers. Visit [Momence](https://momence.com) to learn more or start your free trial today.
